item.title: About
item.description: In mid 1990-s with international team of Shell OH successfully brought company to gas retail market of Russia, than started a career in the electric power production and transmission industry. By 2013, have held key management positions including the construction of nuclear power plants around the globe and Vice President of the Russian Federationâ€™s Energy Agency (REA), State Ministry of Energy. Educational attainments include an M.S. in physics, St. Petersburg State Technical University, 1994, and an M.
